climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Reliable Plug and Play: The USB receiver provides a reliable wireless connection up to 33 ft (1), so you can forget about drop-outs and delays and you can take it wherever you use your computer.Keyboard Key type: Deep profile. Mouse Scroll Wheel: Yes, 2D, optical.Enhanced Function Keys : Yes. Ergonomic : No.

Type in Comfort: The design of this keyboard creates a comfortable typing experience thanks to the low-profile, quiet keys and standard layout with full-size F-keys, number pad, and arrow keys, Caps lock indicator light

Durable and Resilient: This full-size wireless keyboard features a spill-resistant design (2), durable keys and sturdy tilt legs with adjustable height. Comfortable Mouse: This compact wireless mouse is designed to be equally comfortable for both left- and right-handed users, plus its smooth cursor control allows easy navigation on most surfaces
Long Battery Life: MK270 combo features a 36-month keyboard and 12-month mouse battery life (3), along with on/off switches allowing you to go months without the hassle of changing batteries
Easy to Use: This wireless keyboard and mouse combo features 8 multimedia hotkeys for instant access to the Internet, email, play/pause, and volume so you can easily check out your favorite sites
Battery information: Requires two AAA batteries, and one AA battery
body.description: The stylish Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is perfect for the home office or workplace. Ditch the touchpad for this full size keyboard and mouse. Easily connect using Logitech's plug and forget receiver—just plug it into the USB port, and you're ready to work. There's no lengthy installation procedure to slow you down. When you're on the move, the receiver stores comfortably inside the mouse. Both the keyboard and mouse included in the MK270 combo use wireless 2.4GHz connectivity to provide seamless, interruption free use. Use the keyboard within a 10 m range without keyboard lag. Work for longer with the MK270's long battery life. The keyboard can be used for up to 24 months, and the mouse for 12 months, without replacing batteries. The Logitech MK270 keyboard includes 8 hotkeys that are programmable to your most used applications to boost your productivity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Logitech MK270 Reliable Wireless Combo Power through your workflow without missing a beat. MK270 is purpose-built for uninterrupted wireless connectivity, battery power and personal performance so you can focus on the task at hand instead of technical difficulties.

Logitech Advanced 2.4 GHz wireless You get a reliable connection up to 10 meters away, with virtually no delays or dropouts—even in the busiest wireless environments. Long Battery Life Minimize downtime and battery changes with up to 36 months of keyboard battery life and 12 months of mouse power.* Standard batteries come pre-installed. Feel-good typing A full-size, spill-resistant* keyboard with low-profile, whisper-quiet keys, F-keys and a number pad is comfortable, convenient, and built to last for easy use. Keyboard shortcuts Save time with eight keyboard hot keys. They provide instant access to most-used applications like email, Internet and volume up/down. Contoured optical mouse Enjoy all-day comfort for your hand and smooth, accurate tracking. There’s also a storage compartment for the wireless receiver so it stays safely at hand when you’re on the go. Plug-and-play wireless connection Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port and start using your keyboard and mouse right away without software to install.
System Requirements Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, USB port

Have you lost your receiver? The MK270 receiver is stored in the product packaging next to the mouse. If you have lost it and need a replacement. Please see below for our Installation manual. How to reconnect your mouse/keyboard with the receiver? To reconnect the mouse/keyboard with the receiver, download and use the Connection Utility software from Logitech Support. Please see below for our Installation manual. Some keys are not working, what to do? Make sure the USB receiver is connected directly to your computer. Do not connect it through a USB hub, extender, switch or other types of extension devices. Please see below for our Installation manual. Connectivity and USB troubleshooting Restart your computer and make sure the mouse & keyboard are turned on and not too far away from the USB Receiver. Please see below for our Installation manual. My NumPad/KeyPad is not working, what should I do? Ensure that the NumLock key is enabled. Please see below for our Installation manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Connectivity and Reliable Performance - Logitech MK270 Wireless Combo
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded to the Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, and it has proven to be a game-changer in terms of convenience and reliability. This 2.4 GHz wireless combo offers a seamless connectivity experience and delivers reliable performance for everyday computing tasks.Effortless Setup (5/5):Setting up the Logitech MK270 combo was a breeze. The plug-and-play design allowed for effortless connectivity to my Windows system. Within minutes, I was ready to enjoy the wireless freedom that this combo offers.Compact and Ergonomic Design (5/5):The compact and ergonomic design of both the keyboard and mouse enhances the overall user experience. The keyboard layout is comfortable, with well-spaced keys that provide a satisfying typing experience. The mouse fits comfortably in hand, and the overall design promotes extended usability without causing fatigue.Long Battery Life (5/5):One of the standout features of this combo is the impressive battery life. The extended battery life of both the keyboard and mouse means fewer interruptions for battery changes. It's a practical aspect that adds to the overall convenience of the MK270 combo.Reliable Wireless Connectivity (5/5):The 2.4 GHz wireless connectivity of the Logitech MK270 combo is highly reliable. I experienced minimal lag or disruptions during use, even when operating from a distance. The strong wireless connection ensures a responsive and consistent performance for both the keyboard and mouse.Instant Media Access (5/5):The dedicated media control keys on the keyboard provide instant access to media functions. Adjusting volume, pausing or playing music, and navigating between tracks can be done with a simple touch. It's a convenient feature that adds to the versatility of the combo.Space-Saving Design (5/5):The compact design of both the keyboard and mouse contributes to a space-saving setup. Ideal for those with limited desk space, the MK270 combo manages to provide a full keyboard and a responsive mouse without sacrificing on comfort or functionality.Sturdy Build Quality (5/5):Logitech's commitment to build quality is evident in the MK270 combo. The sturdy construction of both the keyboard and mouse instills confidence in their durability. The materials used feel robust, ensuring that the combo withstands regular use.Affordable Wireless Solution (5/5):Considering the wireless capabilities, ergonomic design, reliable performance, and brand reputation, the Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo offer excellent value for the price. It's an affordable solution for those seeking a reliable wireless setup without compromising on quality.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo deliver a seamless and reliable wireless experience. With effortless setup, compact and ergonomic design, long battery life, reliable wireless connectivity, instant media access, space-saving design, sturdy build quality, and an affordable price point, this combo is a standout choice for anyone in need of a dependable wireless keyboard and mouse solution. Highly recommended for Windows users seeking convenience and performance in a compact package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with High Tech Computers
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this keyboard to replace a keyboard that quit. This keyboard does work perfectly with the computer but new mouse doesn't work correctly. Computer couldn't find the mouse (its a really low end mouse) and it would lose scrolling. I thought this combo was defective so I sent it back to have it replaced. I found ou the replacement did the very same thing. Well, I tried this on another computer and it works perfectly on a lower end computer. (No problems with the mouse.) So if you plan on using this combo. By a better keyboard and mouse combo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I thought about getting a wireless keyboard for years but being so cheap, I didn't want to spend the money for something I didn't need. Well, my wired keyboard started to fail, so I finally had the reason to buy this one. I'd like to go back in time and slap myself very hard now.This is worth more than the 20 bucks I gave for it. Probably worth about twice as much. It's just a nice basic keyboard with a few extras I didn't have on my old basic one; see it's top row.So nice to set it on my lap and not having to screw with a wire anymore. If you're looking for just a decent, basic wireless keyboard, this things great! Simple and clean without wires. Working fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value keyboard.
reviews.reviewText: This was to replace a key board that my wife spilled wine on. It is a good value and works fine. The wireless connection need a direct unobstructed line on sight to the keyboard--more so than my last one. Over all a good value, but not a high end feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Wireless Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard so much I even take it with me when I am going to be using my laptop. I just sit it on the laptop and off I go. My only problem with this order was the shipping kept being delayed. It appeared to be Amazon's issue in sending it to the wrong post office--as in the wrong state. However, after a couple of delays, I ended up receiving the package earlier than Amazon predicted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a friend as a holiday gift. She was still using the old keyboard with wires attached and besides it being outdated her keyboard was making noise when she typed. This was easy to install and loves the keyboard and is able to type with ease and I love that it’s affordable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, lasts forever, long battery life
reviews.reviewText: I bough this wireless keyboard and mouse six years ago for a second computer because I was so happy with this model on another system. It occurred to me how I love them today so I decided to find my order on Amazon to write a review. Part of why I love them so much is very reasonable the price. The keyboard and mouse both have a switch on them to preserve battery life which makes needing to replace batteries to, well so long I have no idea. The main system I use has monitors off to the side of a recliner in the living room so a wireless system makes a keyboard in the lap and mouse on the arm of the chair convenient. But even for desk situations I don't want to deal with yet more wires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works and works well. Sturdy. Reliable. Easy to use. Responds to the touch. And has not stopped working or moved into a strange mode ... once. Good deal and good product. Well satisfied. Thanks

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Combo with a Tiny Mouse Nitpick! 🌟⌨️🖱️
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, and overall, it's been a fantastic addition to my workspace.Efficient Wireless Connectivity:The wireless connectivity of both the keyboard and mouse is seamless and efficient. I appreciate the freedom it provides, eliminating the hassle of tangled cords and offering flexibility in positioning.Responsive Keyboard:The keyboard is impressively responsive, with well-spaced keys that make typing a breeze. The tactile feedback adds to the typing experience, and I find myself typing with increased accuracy and speed.Long Battery Life:One of the standout features is the impressive battery life. The combo seems to be incredibly power-efficient, sparing me the constant need for battery replacements. It's a small detail that contributes to the overall convenience.Tiny Mouse Nitpick:My only complaint, and it's a minor one, is that the mouse is rather small. While it doesn't hinder its functionality, those with larger hands might find it a bit petite. However, this is a personal preference, and the mouse still performs admirably in terms of responsiveness and precision.Compact Design:The compact design of both the keyboard and mouse is a plus for those with limited desk space. The combo strikes a balance between functionality and space efficiency, making it suitable for various setups.Overall Impression:In conclusion, the Logitech MK270 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo is an excellent choice for those seeking a reliable and affordable solution. The efficient wireless connectivity, responsive keyboard, and long battery life outweigh the minor nitpick about the size of the mouse. It's a combo that delivers on both performance and convenience.Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Me gusto mucho y tengo mucha suerte con los productos Logitech!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse & keyboard set. Easy to install and use. Only criticism is that the keys are quite Chucky and bit noisy when typing. Otherwise great so far.
Slow in shipping but fast on the board.Like it
